page.title: 06Farming In Kirkby
page.content: {Meadow Farm}near Bentinck Pit. Mr. Sowter's farm is 170 acres and he uses his farm for cereals, beef and milk production. He has got 15 dairy cows and has got some more animals for children, like horses, goats and geese. He grows wheat, barley, oil seed rape and potatoes. {Prospect Farm}, Kirkby Woodhouse. Mrs. Lee couldn't tell us how big her farm is because she had it written down somewhere but she didn't know where. She uses the farm for dairy cows and crops. She couldn't tell us how many cows either because when calves are born they go to a milking parlour and she would add two or take three away so she couldn't tell us how many altogether. She grows barley, wheat, oats and grass.
